name: places/ChIJD5oU9zlZwokRlWjvgOhzNio
adrFormatAddress: 597 Broadway, New York, NY 10012-3211, USA

originalText.text: I had been dying to go to this store and stumbled upon it while walking with some friends. We went in and we were NOT disappointed! Quinn and Ellen helped me find the most perfect jeans in maybe 5 minutes which never happens for me! I bought the jeans immediately and we went on for lunch. My friends and I ended up coming back a couple hours later because they wanted jeans too! We walked out with more jeans and shorts that we are so excited about! Ellen and Quinn made our experience so memorable! They were sweet, knowledgeable, helpful but not pushy at all. We walked away wanting to genuinely be friends with them haha I will recommend this store to anyone looking for vintage finds or the perfect pair of jeans!

originalText.text: Best shopping experience ever!!!!! I was looking for a brown leather jacket and was just casually talking about it then one of the staff kindly brought bunch of brown leather jacket from down stairs and showed me more options!! I was able to find the perfect jacket, which literally made my day!! Huge thanks to the amazing staff

originalText.text: Walked in expecting to find your typical vintage shop that’s in total disarray where you’d have to dig through to find anything worth purchasing. Instead, can’t say enough about this place - super organized (I’m a sucker for color coding) and amazing staff. Shout out to Ellen and Quinn in back who helped me score an awesome leather jacket. Will definitely be back!

originalText.text: Amara and Ellen are truly such angels and everyone should get to experience shopping for jeans like I did with them! They were so conscious of my preferences, budget, size and general comfort while dealing with trying on jeans, which I normally avoid like the plague. No scary soho mean fashion girl vibes here, just tons of support and sizes and options. Ya gotta go!!

originalText.text: Quinn and Ellen were seriously so amazing when it came to buying jeans! My group had a blast and they were so patient with us! I would HIGHLY recommend this for anyone in the area!!!
